snippet.title: Cryptid Farm - Steam Wishlist Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW!!!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1892140/Cryptid_Farm/

This is the Steam Wishlist trailer for my game Cryptid Farm. The game has been in development now for quite some time, but I'm happy to start promoting the page whilst I make the finishing touches.

Cryptid Farm is a multiplayer horror-farming game that I've been working on since early 2020. The game involves a simple loop of planting, watering your crops, and harvesting them whilst always at the peril of wandering cryptids.

You can find the demo and a development history on my itch.io here: https://fistflame.itch.io/cryptid-farm

Special thanks to my editor and composer for helping make this trailer possible, you guys nailed it! Also a special thanks to the Cryptid Farm community for working with me to record this footage :D

Trailer Credits:
Gameplay recording - FistFlame (Me)

Editor - KoalaPupProductions

Music - Pompadoormat
